entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character in the story, and his temper is mentioned as being on edge throughout the day. He is also the one who suggests Lord Voldemort as a possible attacker.

entities.name: professor umbridge
entities.description: Professor Umbridge is the teacher in the classroom, and she is described as having a 'horrribly honeyed voice' and a 'grimly satisfied expression' on her face. She also takes away points from Gryffindor.

entities.name: lord voldemort
entities.description: Lord Voldemort is mentioned as a possible attacker of children like Harry's friends.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron gasps in response to Harry's suggestion that Lord Voldemort might be the attacker.

entities.name: lavender brown
entities.description: Lavender Brown utters a little scream in response to Harry's suggestion.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville slips sideways off his stool in response to Harry's suggestion.

entities.name: gryffindor
entities.description: Gryffindor is a house at Hogwarts that loses points due to Harry's behavior.

relationships.description: Harry suggests that Lord Voldemort might be the attacker of children like himself and his friends.
Professor Umbridge takes away points from Gryffindor as a result of Harry's behavior.
